titles.title: Encouraging municipalities to adopt and enforce effective protections against dog bites, and for other purposes.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Horticulture .

bill.summary: Calls for: (1) each community to address the issues of dog bites and dangerous dogs; and (2) municipalities to consider, and enact model programs and legislation addressing, the factors contributing to a dog's temperament, including whether a dog is continuously chained and whether a male dog has been neutered.
